900044080.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
Put 2 random followers from your deck into your hand.
900044080.baseFlair_: Fate intertwined with the blue-haired girl's, the boy dreams of what lies beyond the horizon. He flies the infinite skies, buoyed by an unshakable resolve and steadfast companions.

900044090.baseEffect_:
Deal 10 damage to a random enemy follower.
Recover 1 evolution point.
Recover 2 play points.
900044090.baseFlair_: Sharing a fate with the blue-haired girl, the young adventurer is driven by her father's words. She flies the eternal skies on wings forged of warm camaraderie and unbreakable bonds.

900044100.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If you have at least 20 cards in your deck, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
900044100.baseFlair_: With greatness comes oneness. Free will is the epitome of the self, and the divine manifest. Therefore, divinity dwells within us all; it is omnipresent in this world. Prove your supremacy by surpassing all and becoming the true One.

900044110.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to the enemy leader.
Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Draw 5 cards.
Give the enemy leader the following effect: At the start of your next turn, discard 5 random cards from your hand.
900044110.baseFlair_: Ravenousness is born of craving. To the famished masses, the bounty of nature is a tantalizing feast. To the lovelorn, even the most rotten fruit's flesh is sickly sweet. Only by tasting that sour, bitter fruit can boys finally ripen into men.

100011010.baseFlair_: You think I look pretty scary, huh? Well, there ain't nothin' to me really. I'm kinda the lowest of the low. I don't got no strength, no wisdom. I don't think you'd like me when I get angry though.
100011010.evoFlair_: You don't gotta be scared of me. Everyone knows I'm just a little goon. Still, you shouldn't mess with folk who've got weapons. This sword's kinda tiny, but it still hurts.

104011030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Neutral follower.
104011030.baseFlair_: Though he's a merman, he never attacks people and instead stands contemplatively on the beach. He sometimes offers people wisdom and is thus known as the sage of the sea.
104011030.evoFlair_: He bestows wisdom upon those who have the mettle to lead the future, and they become the sages of the next age.

110011020.baseFlair_: It is he who hath forged the resplendent gates and sacred temples of heaven. Verily, the celestial realm is his workshop, and he is wont to protect his creations.
110011020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110011020.evoFlair_:
His hammer ringeth across the heavens, like unto a blessed bell. One angel is drawn by the rhythmic chorus of his labor.
"Ding-dong, ding-dong!"
"You annoying little—I'm trying to work here!"

118011010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Summon 2 Rivaylian Bandits. Then give +1/+1 to all allied Rivaylian Bandits.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, gain +1/+2 and Rush.
118011010.baseFlair_: Who gives a rat's ass what I steal? Listen kid, if you wanna survive on the streets of Rivayle, you either get busy livin' or die tryin'.
118011010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118011010.evoFlair_: Everybody and her mama is poor as sin. Life's about as cheap as a bullet. That's why you gotta live full speed ahead. You stop and you're a sittin' duck for somebody else. So you be thankful now. I'm sendin' you off to a better place.

125011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If this is your first turn, draw a card. If this is your eighth turn or later, evolve this follower.
125011010.baseFlair_: One day, the Goblin King ordered one of his minions to get some fresh water. The goblin he sent, however, had forgotten where the watering hole was. Thus, his epic journey began.
125011010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
125011010.evoFlair_: The goblin eventually found the watering hole, but by then, had forgotten why he had ventured outside in the first place. He continued wandering, never to be seen again.

717011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If this is your first turn, draw a card. If this is your eighth turn or later, evolve this follower.
717011010.baseFlair_: I'm on a mission from the princess herself. The king arranged a marriage with this booger of a goblin, but she wasn't having it. My job's to dig up the sparkliest, handsomest fella I can find. Got my tools, now let's get ourselves a man!
717011010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
717011010.evoFlair_: Lotsa goblins have their unique charms. I wonder what the princess wants? Someone as lithe as that little cloud? Or a hulking muscular man, like the one next to it? Aw, the clouds keep changing, and the breeze feels nice... I'll think about it tomorrow... Zzz...

127011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Angel of the Gospel or Herald of the Horn into your hand.
127011010.baseFlair_: Have stars that need watching? You're in luck—I offer professional starsitting services! Want someone to look after your home star? No problem: my eyes will be glued to it! If I spot anything unusual, I dispatch an angel to the scene, so you can rest at ease!
127011010.evoFlair_: Hmm? Something seems odd about this one. Can I get an angel dispatched to this star, pronto? Please double-check that the client is all right. Where are they? I don't know, my globe doesn't tell me that!

128011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 3 enemy followers are in play and no other allied followers are in play, evolve this follower.
128011010.baseFlair_: Rumors tell of a goblin scholar who wanders the land, drifting from academy to academy. The tiny prodigy became an inspiration to all he met—proof that anyone can aspire to greater knowledge.
128011010.evoFlair_:
The exam hall's door was thrown wide to reveal the tiny scholar. Everyone watched with breathless awe as he sauntered over to a seat.
...A goblin? Remembering to show up for a test? Unheard of!

900011080.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request...
Initializing Project: Core.
Starting up.
900011080.evoFlair_:
Confirming changes to core.
Functional restrictions partially lifted.
Accelerating optimization.

124021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Use X play points and gain +X/+X. X equals your remaining play points.
124021010.baseFlair_:
He fights evermore in the name of justice—sword and shield at the ready...
"Wait, you guys, how long am I supposed to do this for?"
124021010.evoFlair_:
Initially a performance done in jest—a mimicry of the knights of lore. However, do something ironically for long enough, and it soon becomes sincere.
"A goblin fights, so that goblinkind can live as their goblin selves without fear."

127021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish a card from your hand and put a copy of it into your deck. Put a Peckish Owlcat into your hand.
127021020.baseFlair_: Even in the pitch-black darkness, Owlcat's eyes see all! I am the nocturnal guardian of love and peace; the one and only... Owlcat Girl!
127021020.evoFlair_: My squishy paw wand catches everything—not even the fastest vole will get away! With my catlike reflexes and avian grace, I, Owlcat Girl, will be the guardian of love and peace!

126031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Until the end of the turn, subtract 2 from the cost of a Neutral follower that originally costs at least 5 play points in your hand and give it the following effect - At the end of your turn, if this follower is in play, destroy it.
126031010.baseFlair_:
Do you believe in fate? I don't put any stock in that stuff at all. The world would be super boring if everything was already figured out for us.
—Mikado Shirogane
126031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give another allied follower the following effect - Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
126031010.evoFlair_:
If it turns out you do have what it takes... well, things will certainly be more interesting.
—Mikado Shirogane

900031030.baseFlair_:
A hollow soldier of the impending silence.
It haunts the living and slowly gnaws away at their will to resist.
900031030.evoFlair_:
Break this, destroy that—I'm sick of these voices! What's "welcome the new world" even supposed to mean?!
...Urgh, get outta my head! I ain't takin' orders from anyone.
—Takuma Kibakura

120014010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Give 2 allied followers Last Words: Randomly restore 1 or 2 defense to your leader.
(Can be played only when 2 targetable allied followers are in play.)
120014010.baseFlair_: A life's journey, in one painting.

715014010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Give 2 allied followers Last Words: Randomly restore 1 or 2 defense to your leader.
(Can be played only when 2 targetable allied followers are in play.)
715014010.baseFlair_: If you share your precious memories with others... If they are truly precious... the people who share those memories with you will want to hold on to them, too.

122014010.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
Enhance (4): Give it +3/+3.
122014010.baseFlair_: Downtrodden sighs, downturned eyes—all lifted by a feather dancing gently in angelic light.

900014010.baseEffect_:
Restore 1 defense to an ally.
If it's a Machina follower, restore 3 defense instead.
900014010.baseFlair_:
Confirming damage to core.
Functional restrictions partially lifted.
Activating repair system.

101024010.baseFlair_: One loosed arrow becomes a light that pierces the heart of an evildoer.

105024010.baseEffect_:
Select a Neutral follower in your hand and put a copy of it into your hand.
Change all allied followers in play into Neutral followers.
105024010.baseFlair_: I wonder what I'll find in there! —Alice, Wonderland Explorer

106024010.baseEffect_:
Banish a card in your hand.
Put a copy of the banished card into your deck.
Draw a card.
106024010.baseFlair_: You are not, dear cowardly one, worthy of this fate. So in place of fate, I shall rewind time—but only a little, for a little is all you deserve. —The Goddess of Time

107024010.baseEffect_: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Forest of Dreams, Arthurian Light, Enchanted Library, Phoenix Roost, Grave Desecration, Bloodfed Flowerbed, or Pegasus Sculpture.
107024010.baseFlair_: Companions, knowledge, and tools. When the three are assembled, a new adventure unfolds. —The Adventurer's Handbook

115024010.baseEffect_:
Select an allied follower and an enemy follower. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
115024010.baseFlair_: Fight to the finish and show your pride. Swing your blade as though the fate of the world rested on your shoulders.

121034010.baseEffect_: Put 2 Naterran Great Trees into your hand.
121034010.baseFlair_: As time passed, two people became one. Robots tilled the soil for a bountiful fruit harvest. Beastfolk worked the earth for a bountiful metal harvest. The seeds they sowed bore fruit that would sustain them for generations to come. —Tales from Naterra, Entry 18

900034030.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Restore 2 defense to your leader if the enemy leader's defense is higher than yours.
900034030.baseFlair_: Truly sublime. It warms me to my very core. It seems he's finally mastered the use of medicinal herbs to create a delicate yet aromatic flavor. You've outdone yourself again, Gourmet Emperor. —Lyriola, Supreme Critic

900034040.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
900034040.baseFlair_: Now this is quite the surprise. It burns me to my very core. Yet, the spices and umami flavors dance in zesty harmony... I expected nothing less, Gourmet Emperor. —Lyriola, Supreme Critic

900044040.baseEffect_:
Until the start of your next turn, add 10 to the original cost of spells in your opponent's hand. (Only affects cards in hand at the time this effect is activated.)
Draw a card.
900044040.baseFlair_: Ethereal soul or corporeal flesh, a frozen fate awaits all beings caught in gelid gaze.

900044050.baseFlair_: From his fingertips it surges, rendering all that is to naught, and all that is naught to being.

108013010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied follower until the end of the turn.
Last Words: Draw a card.
108013010.baseFlair_: The angels shed tears for the sorrow of the world of men. Then the tears fell to earth, forming a great spring withal. And the spring of tears comforted the people, and it blessed them. —Chapter 3, Angelon Erga

115013010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Destroy an enemy follower.
Whenever an enemy follower evolves during your opponent's turn, deal 2 damage to that follower (up to 5 times per turn).
115013010.baseFlair_: Though the gate may tower above you, you should nevertheless prostrate yourself in humility.

900012010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any other allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1.
Last Words: Draw a card.
900012010.baseFlair_:
Naterra, a verdant world born from the bounty of aether.
Seeds of conflict take root as its populace fractures and clashes.
Peace or war. Light or shadow.
When the Mother begins to sing, all will be decided.

900012020.baseEffect_: During your turn, when an allied follower comes into play, give it +1/+1 and banish this amulet.
900012020.baseFlair_: Though not a thoroughbred mount by any stretch of the imagination, those who've traveled through the wastelands have found a valuable companion in this horse.

121023010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
Last Words: If it's your turn, put a random Machina card (excluding Aiolon's Remains) from your deck into your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.
121023010.baseFlair_: This world is nothing more than a giant scrap heap. But the people who were left behind refuse to give up hope; they come out of their sectors, shaking off the rust that had settled over them, searching for a new way forward. —Tales from Naterra, Entry 7

122023010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Add X to this amulet's Countdown. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
At the end of your turn, activate 1 of the following effects in order.
1. Restore 1 defense to your leader.
2. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
3. Give +3/+3 to a random allied follower.
4. Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
122023010.baseFlair_: The story never truly ends. Grown-ups just get tired of turning pages.

106033010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (7)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 7 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put 3 random followers from your deck into your hand.
106033010.baseFlair_: For the virtuous, there is no salvation greater than death. —Holy Teachings, Chapter 1

122033010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Once on each of your turns, when an allied follower is destroyed, summon a Shadow Soldier. If at least 15 allied followers have been destroyed this match, summon a Shadow Commander instead.
122033010.baseFlair_: A portent of placidity, omen of new order. Should the seal on it break, only deafening silence awaits.

100011020.baseFlair_: In this world of conflict, the only thing a man can truly rely on is his strength. That is why I must continue to fight, continue to win. I simply must.
100011020.evoFlair_: In this world of conflict, the only thing a man can truly rely on is his strength. With this sword I shall carve out a future for myself!

101011010.baseFlair_: "Ugly," they called me. "Monster," they screamed as they fled from the sight of me. No human would deign to help a beast like me. And so I sought power—the power to protect myself.
101011010.evoFlair_: Violence is my armor. It shields my body, shields my mind against the slings and arrows of those heartless scoundrels who revile me. Look at me, slanderers—behold my valor as you crumble before it!

103011040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if an allied Neutral follower that costs at least 5 play points is in play.
103011040.baseFlair_: Victory is in my grasp! Let the people rejoice! And, to the losers, honorable defeat or atrocious executions. The choice is theirs!
103011040.evoFlair_: Putting your life on the line makes any victory that much more glorious! Now answer to me!

103011060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the attack of the strongest enemy follower in play.
103011060.baseFlair_: So, you look at me and all you see is a tasty-looking duck, huh? That's only because your heart is losing its purity!
103011060.evoFlair_: That's right. I'm a mirror into your soul. My appearance in your eyes was a test to see if you're fit to set foot on sacred ground!

104011040.baseEffect_: Clash: Destroy the enemy follower if its attack is 1.
104011040.baseFlair_: An ill-fated tomcat who was fused with an owl by uncanny magic. He prowls the skies by night and pines for his old life in the alleys by day.
104011040.evoFlair_: With his prey before him, the owlcat's thoughts fly as furiously as him. Hoo-reow! Hoo-reow! Hoo-reow! The cries of his victim drive him into ecstasy.

107011030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
107011030.baseFlair_: Oinkie, oink! My tummy's just full of happy! Happy oinkie to the whole wide worldie!
107011030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
107011030.evoFlair_: Oink, oinkie! Eat that sadness away and fill your tummy with happy! And just like that... Doink! Fill the whole wide world with happy!

108011020.baseFlair_: Bow down before me, sugar-slurping plebes! Yes, I am the tart fairy! An upper-crust morsel fit for kings!
108011020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return a random enemy follower to the opponent's hand.
108011020.evoFlair_: Bronzed and buttery on the outside, gooey on the inside. Manners can wait—it's time to dig in! Huh? Hold up! No running away!

110011030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand - Goblin or Goblin Leader.
110011030.baseFlair_: The scouting party lift their voices to reveal the enemy's position. Answering battle cries sound from the front lines. Orders ring out from the commanders. The army moves as if of one mind, motivated by a single, driving thought: "Gimme that, it's mine!"
110011030.evoFlair_:
"This plan is foolproof! A thing of beauty!"
—Goblin Leader
"Yeesh, we're gonna be knee-deep in goblins all day, huh?"
—Village Guard

111011030.baseFlair_: There's nothing better than a well-seasoned dish! That magical flavor that bursts on your tongue and takes your whole body by storm! Take pepper, for example. Just sprinkle it in and... Uwachoo! Ehehe... See?
111011030.evoFlair_: I know I talk a good game, but I'm still learning my way around the spice rack. Still, I won't give up! Someday, I'll make food that'll explode on your tongue and shake you to the core!

112011020.baseFlair_: My brother-in-arms, he who skewers enemies with a flash of lightning. Though he may be an abysmal fool, upon revealing his true splendor he is capable of piercing through all creation. —Grimnir, Warring Tempest
112011020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
112011020.evoFlair_: Hey, this is my buddy Hnikar! He can be a bit of a screwup, but battle's where he really shines! —Grimnir, Warring Tempest

112011030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.

Initializing Project: Core.
Starting up... Startup failed.

112011030.evoFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Confirming changes to core.

ERROR. Switching priority to energy conservation.

113011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.

Verifying access request... Access granted.

Starting up... Startup failed.
Initiating auxiliary unit... Activating antigrav.
113011010.evoFlair_:
Antigrav online. Part assembly... OK.

Assembly complete. ERROR. Repairing.
Corresponding assistance needed.

114011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Investigation into your hand.
114011020.baseFlair_:
"I'll pay you back if it takes my whole life to do it! So please... please! Will you take the case?"
The detective reached out and took the candy in the boy's hand. "This will do for my fee," he said.
114011020.evoFlair_:
A detective needs two things: deductive reasoning and inspiration. That and a dash of sweetness. The old gray matter needs sugar to produce those flashes of insight.
"Another pro bono job... I really am a soft touch."

115011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers that have Ambush active.
115011020.baseFlair_:
But we were perfectly hidden! How'd they target us so accurately? Our enemy must be one skilled marksman!
—Ninja Trainee
115011020.evoFlair_:
"Hey! Look right! Fresh meat!"
"Which way's right?" "The opposite of left!"
"Which way's left?" "The opposite of right!"
—Conversation between two goblins

116011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied Machina or Natura follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
116011020.baseFlair_: "Art is an expression of the self." He laughs as he smears his brush across the canvas. "And the only way to make great art is to have full faith in oneself." He gazes calmly, even happily, on his subjects: a city guard and monster locked in a life-and-death battle.
116011020.evoFlair_:
An artist's character is not necessarily in accord with his or her work. Take for example this creative chap. Though he's the picture of egoism, his paintings are nothing short of breathtaking!
—Musings of an Unnamed Artist

118011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Dutiful Steed. If it is your fifth turn or later, summon a Bullet Bike instead.
118011020.baseFlair_:
"Why do I travel, you ask? To experience the thrill and joy of adventure, of course."
"I doubt the varmints you encounter think the same."
"Some of 'em tag along with me on the road, but don't you lump me in with 'em." —Wasteland Journal, Interview 1
118011020.evoFlair_:
"Rumors speak of him fighting as a mercenary in the desert. Wearing shining armor and riding a white steed, he often gazes longingly at the horizon. His thirst for adventure never runs dry."
—Wasteland Journal, Interview 1 Follow-Up

715011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Dutiful Steed. If it is your fifth turn or later, summon a Bullet Bike instead.
715011010.baseFlair_:
"Why do I travel, you ask? To experience the thrill and joy of adventure, of course."
"I doubt the varmints you encounter think the same."
"Aw, that's what my partner here is for! Together we can get through anything!" —Wasteland Journal, Interview 1
715011010.evoFlair_: "Wayfarers have spotted her galloping across the desert astride her trusty steed. She prances through perils as if it's a square dance, laughing and carefree. One look at her is enough to ignite the spark of adventure in your heart." —Wasteland Journal, Interview 1 Follow-Up

119011020.baseFlair_: If you want to be a great detective, you have to remember the three Rs: Research, Recon, and... Uh, I'll tell you the third one once you start showing potential.
119011020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Master Sleuth.
119011020.evoFlair_:
"Looks like we've finally solved the murder at the bakery. You might say this case... was a piece of cake!"
In other words, the three Rs are Research, Recon, and... witty Retorts?
—Junior Detective's Notebook

120011020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon an Armored Goblin.
Enhance (6): Summon 2 Armored Goblins instead. Give Ward to all allied Armored Goblins.
Last Words: Give +0/+3 to a random allied follower.
120011020.baseFlair_: A band of goblins came upon a large, shining hunk of metal. Soon, they discovered it had many uses: as a grill, a pot lid, and best of all a sled.
120011020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120011020.evoFlair_: One day, a goblin grabbed the hunk of metal to shield himself from an oncoming arrow. The other goblins grew vexed at their clumsy brother—what would happen if their precious treasure broke?

121011020.baseFlair_:
Who knew such a fearsome beast would be guarding this labyrinth? But why did it lower its weapon? Was it trying to talk to me? No. It was clearly waiting for me to let my guard down and then it would have been game over!
—Lost and Confused Adventurer

122011020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack until the end of your opponent's turn.
Enhance (5): Gain +3/+3 and Ward.
122011020.baseFlair_: I was at rock bottom, just a frog in a well. But I knew—someday my music would bring tears of joy instead of pain. (ribbit)
122011020.evoFlair_: I've traveled the seas, studying my craft. And now they know—my music brings tears, laughter, and thunderous applause! (ribbit)

123011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card.
123011010.baseFlair_: The water's flow is like a cantata. As she raises her conductor's baton, all other sounds cease. The air stills, as if in anticipation. "Now that the noise is gone, the world can appreciate the pure beauty of your harmony."
123011010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card.
123011010.evoFlair_: The whisper of the wind is like a saraband! As she twirls her conductor's baton, the beasts in the cave begin to dance. "If you open your ears, music can be found anywhere!"

125011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Fount of Angels or Angelic Melody into your hand.
125011020.baseFlair_: The angels decreed that I have to fill a quota of virtue points, but ooh... It's not going so well. At this rate, my supervisor's gonna tear me a new—yeek! What are you doing? Wait, you can see me?
125011020.evoFlair_: Communication is key in the angelic hierarchy! Hmm, according to my notes, I should report this incident, contact the division that deals with wiping memories, and discuss a plan for preventing accidental angel sightings again. Hey, I think I'm getting the hang of this!

126011010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 5 damage to the enemy leader.
126011010.baseFlair_: Oompah... By trumpet's sound we do decree: Judgment Day has come to pass sentence on thee. The sound of your mortal war trumpet is so shrill and irritating... Here's hoping that those performing privileges are revoked!
126011010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126011010.evoFlair_:
Could you all go rehearse somewhere else?
—Herald of the Horn
You can't boss us around anymore, mortal-mingler.
—Angel of Adjudication

101021010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
101021010.baseFlair_: Ding-dong! Hee-hee! Can you hear that? That's the sound of the bells of joy! Try closing your eyes and let it sink deep into your heart!
101021010.evoFlair_: It's time to ring the bells of joy! These are no ordinary bells, you know! They play a song of love that blesses listeners' souls!

102021020.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
102021020.baseFlair_: Check out my dance! It'll make you smile!
102021020.evoFlair_: Dancing is my life! Come on! Dance with me!

103021030.baseFlair_: Go check out the Castle in the Sky! Go smite your old coworker! Sheesh, my boss works us to the bone. I guess it's all a part of the job though!
103021030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
103021030.evoFlair_: So my boss says I've gotta smite you. It'll be sad to see you go, but orders are orders. Time for you to say bye bye!

104021030.baseFlair_: Driven by a dream to put my heart into verse, I travel far and wide. But my dream just isn't doing anything for my stage fright!
104021030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give both leaders the following effect - Allied Fanfare effects will not activate. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
104021030.evoFlair_: Maybe I'm no good at singing, but I still want to share my heart with the world. So could you all listen to my verse just this once?

105021010.baseFlair_: I am the flower that blooms on stage. I sing like a bird and smile like a goddess to welcome the audience into my beautiful tale.
105021010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all other allied Neutral followers.
105021010.evoFlair_: On stage I shine brightest. Some day I'll be the very best actress, one able to express anything in the world! You'll see!

106021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
106021010.baseFlair_: Why did my wings turn black? Why did they chase me out of the skies? And why... why do the angels have to doubt me?
106021010.evoFlair_: Whenever I try to find out why, it hurts deep inside my heart. Tell me, someone, am I a fallen angel? Did I do something bad? If that's the case... If that's how it is, then I...

108021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +2/+2.
Enhance (8): Gain +3/+3 more.
108021010.baseFlair_: Find your way, human. The answer you seek is there inside the order. I found my answer through obedience to the gods—salvation, the only answer.
108021010.evoFlair_: Do not stand in awe, human. Order will in time engender an answer, the answer that obedience is a truth without parallel. Now take this salvation as your own.

113021010.baseEffect_: Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
113021010.baseFlair_: La-la-la! This new dance is difficult, but it's very pretty! It gets everyone teetering and tottering until they all fall down though!
113021010.evoFlair_:
"As always, her dancing gets pretty intense..."
—Medusa
"I don't think I've ever seen anything like this in the underworld..."
—Cerberus

113021020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 2 play points, no allied cards are in play, and at least 1 enemy card is in play, invoke this card.
----------
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +7/+7 and Ward.
113021020.baseFlair_: Thanks for putting all those weapons away—what better way to commemorate the occasion than a song of love and peace? Without further ado, ladies and gentlemen, I give you... Sonata Harmonia!
113021020.evoFlair_: Inciting violence to defeat your enemies? Anyone can do that—instead of such vicious ways, why not spread joy in the name of love and peace? That's why I choose to shred tunes, not faces! Oh, baaaby...

114021010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, put an Extreme Carrot into your hand.
114021010.baseFlair_: Is he some expression of nature's will? Or nature itself? Unsatisfied with baser fare, this paragon of carrotkind embarks on a quest for the lofty heights of gustatory greatness.
114021010.evoFlair_: When this classy carrot's orange peel matures to a ruddier hue, his quest will come to an end. Nature's finest flavors will burst across the tongue, delighting the taste buds and the soul, and the world shall clamor for seconds.

117021010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your turn, put a Cloud Gigas into your deck and banish this follower.
117021010.baseFlair_:
The cloud gigas is as fickle as the weather
One minute he's hot, the next he's cold
For days he'll sit as still as stone
Then disappear in a puff of clouds
—Mountainside Village Folk Song
117021010.evoFlair_:
The clouds in the mountains are mighty tall
And the cloud gigas hides inside them
You might not be able to see him from here
But he'll come running when danger's afoot
—Mountainside Village Folk Song

119021020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Enhance (5): Deal 2 damage, restore 2 defense, and gain +2/+2 instead.
Enhance (8): Deal 4 damage, restore 4 defense, and gain +4/+4 instead.
119021020.baseFlair_: Hey, stop treating me like a child! No, I'm not sad because I miss my master! Ohh, just you wait, I'm going to be a beautiful lady before you know it, and then you won't have any room to talk!
119021020.evoFlair_: We've been traveling a long time together, haven't we? And time has helped me grow into an elegant lady, don't you think? I'm going to keep using my magic to bring smiles to everybody's faces.

125021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish a follower from your hand. Reveal a copy of that follower and put it into your deck. Then, put a random follower with an original cost less than the banished follower's original cost from your deck into your hand.
125021010.baseFlair_: Is there something more important to me than sparkly stuff? I don't know what you mean, but I want to stay with Feena forever. She's not sparkly, but she's important to—ooh! Look, I found a shiny!
125021010.evoFlair_:
Sigh. That's Goblin Mage for you: nothing stands between her and shiny stuff. But she always comes back and looks up at you with those puppy-dog eyes—how's a super cute fortune hunter supposed to stay mad then?
—Feena, Watching Fondly Over a Sleeping Goblin Mage

126021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give Bane to a follower in your hand.
126021010.baseFlair_: I've painted on canvas, walls, floors, and even ceilings. Too restrictive—it's just not enough space for my boundless imagination! I'm gonna go out there with my brush and turn the whole world into my canvas!
126021010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give Rush to a follower in your hand.
126021010.evoFlair_: The most important thing about world painting is to use materials that won't go harming the spirits of the earth. See these paints? They wash away with just a little bit of rain! That's perfect for me, because my brush strokes are more important than leaving a lasting mural!

900021010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
900021010.baseFlair_: The supreme carrot, standing with the most sublime of ingredients. The flavor of its bright orange frame overwhelms all else in creation.
900021010.evoFlair_: The supreme carrot, standing with the most sublime of ingredients. Unsurpassed is its flavor, and heroes dream often of its tastiness and aroma.

Primeval dragon, child of flames and darkness!
Thy name is... Bahamut!

Come, friend. You will cross the dunes safely on the wings of an angel.

Evolve: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.

Fear not, friend, though you are beset by foes.
My steed is a demon who devours the desert itself. Behold his powerful jaws. Are these not the gnashing teeth of the maw of hell itself? Deterrent enough for any craven marauder.

114031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Whenever an enemy follower with Storm attacks your leader, give that follower -2/-0.
114031020.baseFlair_: Mortals are imperfect. They blunder. They change. And because they do, their hopes for the future shine all the brighter. That brilliance locked within their hearts—I plan to reveal it.

114031020.evoFlair_: Thoughts are intangible. They waver. They vanish. And because they do, their brilliance is unparalleled. The sum of their thoughts becomes an aurora intense enough to raze all evil.

116031010.evoFlair_: One wing born of technology, one wing born of nature. The servants of the hybrid god do not waver in battle, adoring and abhorring all creation without contradiction.

118031010.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and restore 3 defense to your leader.
118031010.baseFlair_:
"Why am I always out and about, ya ask? Don'cha hear the ingredients callin' out to me?"
"We heard you'll brave any danger for quality cuisine."
"Bwahaha. Can't cook up much of a meal if you're afraid of a lil' fire." —Wasteland Journal, Chef's Interview
118031010.evoEffect_:

Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and restore 3 defense to your leader.

"There's a nondescript cart that houses one of the finest food stalls round these parts. If yer ever lucky enough to run into it, I recommend their scorpion skewers—desert-hot BBQ, grilled to perfection."
—Wasteland Journal, Chef's Interview Follow-Up

119031010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.

119031010.baseFlair_: I'm Vyrn, and this here's the Captain! Nice to meetcha! We're skyfarers. Hehe, pretty cool, right? Huh? Lizard? Did you just call me a lizard?!
119031010.evoFlair_: Well, it's true that I don't even know what I am... But I know who I am! And now's not the time to be runnin' scared—I'm going to do whatever it takes to help my friends!

121031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.

121031020.baseFlair_: There. Confit of hellbeast served with mushroom sauce. Eat it while it's hot. Where'd I get the idea to cook hellbeast, you ask? Well, it ran straight at my knife and only third-rate cooks waste ingredients.
121031020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Increase your leader's maximum defense by 1, restore 1 defense to your leader, and draw a card.
121031020.evoFlair_: Fighting and cooking have a lot in common. I'd even say that fighting is a step in the cooking process; all I see on the battlefield are ingredients. Those toothpicks that the demons call blades have got nothing on my knife.

Ward.

123031010.baseEffect_:
Ward.

123031010.evoFlair_: Flightless birds, birds of steel, birds that heal the sick, literary birds—they're all part of my flock. I wish I could give every one of them a great, big hug... But since I can't, I'll make sure they stay safe.

124031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Until the end of your opponent's turn, give the enemy leader the following effect - Invocation won't activate for you.
124031020.baseFlair_: Do you think the heavens are free from strife? The realm of man is true paradise, for pandemonium reigns supreme above—it is the work of angels that prevents chaos from breaching beyond the pearly gates.
124031020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower.
124031020.evoFlair_: Floods, plagues, wars, and storms—yet, the realm of man is true paradise, when compared to the evil that dwells above. Mankind must count their blessings, lest the angels fall.

126031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower with a trait from your deck into your hand. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, recover 1 play point. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
126031020.baseFlair_: Beauty begets love; love begets life—thus, the circle continues. She is the goddess of beauty; she is the goddess of life. She is capricious in her manner; she is whimsical in her ways. Neither god nor man is able to resist the allure of a fruit so ripe.
126031020.evoFlair_: Beauty begets war; war begets death—thus, the spiral of mortality continues. She is the goddess of beauty; she is the goddess of death. Though she is a paradox, all are drawn to the orchard over which she presides. "You have lived well... Now, pluck me from the vine."

128031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 3 other Academic cards in your hand, deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
128031010.baseFlair_: How do I look? ...You almost mistook me for a real student? Ahaha, I know it's a bit silly, but I do appreciate you lending me the uniform. It's an honor to be here, and I'll give the opening ceremony my very best performance!

128031010.evoFlair_: I can already tell—this campus will be a precious haven for all of you to learn and grow. Now, let's see... Sopranos, altos... Looks like everyone's ready, so please join me in singing the school anthem!

128031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any evolved allied followers are in play, evolve this follower.

128031020.evoFlair_:
Off she goes east today, out west on the morrow,
In each town, the locals burdened by life's sorrow,
But happiness flowers when she dances awhile,
And the proudest blossom of all, a great big smile.

127033010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Put a random Condemned card from your deck into your hand. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, or if this is your eighth turn or later, subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Last Words: Draw a card.
127033010.baseFlair_: Execution. Renunciation. Sepulture. Redolence. Purification. Penance. Forbearance. Virulence. The eight strata manifest both eightfold sin and vaunted virtue. The edifice looming above all is as the eye of the gods—looking down upon creation, in eternal judgment.

128032010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, and you have more evolution points than your opponent, invoke this card. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
----------
Fanfare: Put a random Academic card (excluding Lainecrest Academy) from your deck into your hand.
During your turn, when an allied Academic follower comes into play, give it +1/+1, restore 1 defense to your leader, and banish this amulet.
128032010.baseFlair_: Follow the established curriculum with us in the East Tower, or revel in the freedom of the West Tower. Choose carefully, for the future of our great kingdom rests on your shoulders.

100011030.baseFlair_: So you want some demons slain? Well, if you're good for the coin, I'm good for the killing. As long as I get what's mine, you'll be more than happy with the results.
100011030.evoFlair_: Work Hard for Your Pay—that's my motto. Hire me and you'll get exactly the fight you hoped for. All right, time to clock in! Come on, demons, your heads will put food on my table!

101011030.baseFlair_: Thousands of arrows have been fired towards it, and yet my shield of light has never been penetrated. Allow me to use it to protect the combatants from harm!
101011030.evoFlair_: I will stand in the way of all disasters and keep you safe from harm! No matter how deep the despair that assails us, I will keep the light of hope shining!

101011040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
101011040.baseFlair_: Bring me the brave warriors injured in battle. I am Heaven's own healer—there is no pain I cannot ease.
101011040.evoFlair_: You war-weary souls, come to me; rest in the healing light of love. Close your eyes. As light bathes your body, feel the flame of courage ignite in you once more.

103011030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random 2-play-point follower from your deck into your hand.
103011030.baseFlair_: It's so sad without Feena here. I think I'll follow her nice and quiet!
103011030.evoFlair_: I'll use my magic illusions to help you, Feena! Just give me shiny stuff to say thanks!

103011050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
103011050.baseFlair_: With this arrow I'll make the will of the lord known!
103011050.evoFlair_: Angelic arrows are truly miraculous! They bring revelation to the just and judgment to the wicked!

104011020.baseFlair_: Come at me! I'll hack you to bits right here! And I promise it'll hurt you more than it hurts me!
104011020.evoFlair_: I can't fall here—not with my family and allies counting on me! So come at me! The battlefield's mine!

105011020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied follower.
105011020.baseFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I am a heavenly angel, and I will bless your troops.
105011020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105011020.evoFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I shall help you see virtue through. I shall fight alongside you as a model warrior, and you will receive my blessings.

105011030.baseEffect_: Summon a Goblin at the end of your turn.
105011030.baseFlair_: Let one get away and it'll call ten, and the ten will call a hundred. You have to squelch them all. —Lucius, Goblin Slayer
105011030.evoFlair_: Don't laugh at the little devils. They may not be wise, but they don't have limits. You've got to squash them all fast. Swordsweep! —Lucius, Goblin Slayer

106011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
106011010.baseFlair_: Bringing darkness wherever she goes, the night goddess hides the stars by painting the sky black. Those who embrace darkness give thanks to her so that they may become one with the pall. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 2
106011010.evoFlair_: Lovers of the pall know how to manage the darkness: let it paint over the senses and conceal one's true nature. The goddess looks on her adorable flock and smiles as she scatters the darkness amongst them. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 4

107011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
107011010.baseFlair_: Do you know the ingredients for adventure? Companions, knowledge, and tools? No silly! Just courage and a dream! Let's go!
107011010.evoFlair_: Embrace your dreams and muster your courage... For with courage, you can make your dreams come true! Now, now, there's no time to lose! I don't know where we're going, but it's sure to be an adventure!

107011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+1. Destroy an enemy amulet.
107011020.baseFlair_: Ga-ha-ha! You're a funny one! Maybe you should hang up your sword and take up comedy! Oh, that's actually your day job? Bwa-ha-ha! You really are a barrel of laughs!
107011020.evoFlair_: Some say I'm too easily amused. If you ask me, though, I say people don't laugh enough! I mean, even the battlefield can be hilarious—look at those serious faces... Bwa-ha-ha!

108011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly gain Ward or Rush.
108011010.baseFlair_: Let confusion get the better of you, human. The answer you seek is there inside the chaos. I found my answer on the other side of confusion—destruction, the only answer.
108011010.evoFlair_: Do not stand in awe, human. Confusion will in time engender an answer, the answer that confusion is a truth without parallel. Now take this chaos as your own.

109011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Elsam of the Brofamily into your hand.
109011020.baseFlair_: Sorry to keep you, like, salivating. Here's your grub with all the—whoa! That lady knight sitting over there... Total babe city!
109011020.evoFlair_: Guess I've got Katalina fever, you know? But I won't stop till I show her the way this heart beats. Kat, watch out! Cuz someday I'm gonna be your numero uno! Waaheey!

111011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If your leader's defense is less than your opponent's, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
111011010.baseFlair_:
Hey, pal. Never seen you 'round here before. You'd better move along though. Don't say I didn't warn ya.
—Kindhearted patron of the Skin of Your Teeth
111011010.evoFlair_:
Hey, buddy! Never seen you in here. Pull up a seat! Hey, barkeep! Give our new friend here the usual, an' make it extra spicy!
—Mean-spirited regular at the Skin of Your Teeth

114011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Natura cards from your deck into your hand.
114011010.baseFlair_: Contrast is what really makes flavors pop! Just think what a dash of salt does for your sweets! So even the nastiest food tastes better from the hands of a cute cook like me! If you know the right way to spin it, you can make anything easier to swallow!
114011010.evoFlair_: Contrast sharpens emotional impact too! Consider how much sweeter victory tastes when snatched from the jaws of defeat! So try eating something whose appearance absolutely terrifies you! The relief you feel will be better than any secret sauce!

116011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have any Machina or Natura cards in your hand, discard 1. Then put 2 random cards that share a trait with that card from your deck into your hand.
116011010.baseFlair_: Ah, heck yeah! Treasure! But you can't trick me, you silly, deadly labyrinth! You're hiding even greater riches deep in your tummy, aren't you?
116011010.evoFlair_: Whoa-ho-ho! The mother lode! They said that dungeon diving would be the end of me—well, look where my treasure tingle's gotten me now!

119011010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare and Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
119011010.baseFlair_: Whenever you're sad or lonely, I'm here for you. My fluffy wings will have you feeling warm and fuzzy in no time!
119011010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119011010.evoFlair_: C'mon everyone, don't fight—just enjoy my fluffiness instead! Fluff will change your life! Fluff will bring world peace!

124011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Festive follower (excluding Torchbearing Guide) from your deck into your hand.
124011010.baseFlair_: A party? Must be some party if you're trekking through these parts, heh. You shouldn't have to worry about safety on your way to a good time, right? Just let me take the lead and we'll get there in one piece, guaranteed.
124011010.evoFlair_: Yo! I'd ask if you had fun, but it's written all over your face. Work hard and play hard, am I right? I imagine you're feeling a bit weary from your travels, so count on me to guide you back home safe and sound.

900011020.baseFlair_: Hurry! Her Royal Majesty is impatient. And if she loses her temper, you'll lose your head.
900011020.evoFlair_: Rebelling against Her Majesty? This won't end well for you. You're merely brazen, not brave.

900011030.baseFlair_: To keep Her Majesty safe is why I'm here. It's why I live.
900011030.evoFlair_: Her Majesty rules! So long as there's breath in my lungs, I'll allow none to touch her.

900011040.baseFlair_: My blade will punish any who disobey Her Majesty.
900011040.evoFlair_: Orders are orders, especially when they're coming from Her Majesty. Death to defiers of the queen!

900011050.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Put a Tomoi of the Brofamily into your hand.
900011050.baseFlair_: Yo! I'm Elsam. It's, like, I'm so honored everybody could get together to share this grindage. As for my lady type... I've got a thing for fashionable girls. Here's to a rad evening, everyone!
900011050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900011050.evoFlair_: All right, you guys ready to begin the forty-fifth grand tourney of the primal beast name game? w00t! w00t!

900011060.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Human! Pyramid! Attack! into your hand.
900011060.baseFlair_: Prime Minister Freesia... Nay, dearest Freezie. Just order me to protect you, and it's done!
900011060.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900011060.evoFlair_: Freezie, stop... I'm still on duty... Zzz...

101021020.baseFlair_: Some monsters are rather more intelligent than others. Take the lizardmen, for example. These creatures fight for each other and for the survival of their species. Thinking they're just dumb reptiles would be disastrous.
101021020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon an unevolved Lizardman.
101021020.evoFlair_: You think you can negotiate with lizardmen just because they speak a few words of human language? Think again. Any information you give them is sure to be used against you one day.

103021040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
103021040.baseFlair_: For the finest chefs, only the finest ingredients will do! Let the cooking begin! Coctura integro!
103021040.evoFlair_: Everything in this world is just one more ingredient to me, including you tasty-looking morsels! Let's see if you can stand up to my most refined cooking technique! Firestorm of damnation!

106021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Draw a card.
106021020.baseFlair_: I don't do songs for the throngs. I only sing for one person. This song is your song. Now lend me your ears.
106021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106021020.evoFlair_: My songs are great and heartfelt, because they're for one and one alone. Please listen as I sing.

107021020.baseFlair_: Whoa! Easy there, big guy! Eyes on the intruder only, got it?
107021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107021020.evoFlair_: Yowza! S-settle down, buddy! I know you want 'em all for yourself, but don't get wild now!

112021020.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, evolve this follower.
112021020.baseFlair_: My brother-in-arms, he who possesses the Eye of Flame. Though he may cross established boundaries and commit taboos, upon sparking his true flame he is capable of reducing all creation to ash. —Grimnir, Warring Tempest
112021020.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
112021020.evoFlair_: Yeah, so this is my buddy Jafnhar! He doesn't really understand the concept of personal space, but he's got an amazing power in one of his eyes! How cool is that? —Grimnir, Warring Tempest

116021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce all damage dealt to 0. (Applies to attacks and effects.)
116021010.baseFlair_: Songs spread peace and bring love to the furthest corners of the world. That's what a very famous singer taught me when I was just starting out. Anyway, here's a single from my upcoming album called Peace Sonata. Baby, it's love and peace...
116021010.evoFlair_:
Whoa, I love this song! Who wrote—Ah! It's mine, isn't it? Who knew it would catch on like this—love and peace, yeah!
—Apollo

118021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Dutiful Steed into your hand.
Last Words: Summon a Bullet Bike.
118021010.baseFlair_:
"Why I roam about? It's my job to explore the frontier."
"With scales for skin, isn't it tough riding a horse?"
"That's why I ride one of these instead. Their stone-cold skin and fiery temperament are a good match for me."
—Wasteland Journal, Interview 2
118021010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118021010.evoFlair_:
"Perk up your ears as you walk along the path of tumbleweeds. If you catch the distinctive hum of a harmonica, consider yourself lucky. The melody from this inhuman adventurer is sure to enliven your travels."
—Wasteland Journal, Interview 2 Follow-Up

120021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any evolved allied followers are in play, evolve this follower.
120021020.baseFlair_:
"This smells like—" "A case, woof!"
A detective's job is to sniff out the truth. Their assistant's job is to fetch clues and track leads.
"Time to question the witnesses! Follow me, woof!"
120021020.evoFlair_:
"Aha! So you're—" "The culprit! We've got you now, woof!"
A detective's job is to find and catch criminals. Their assistant's job is to provide backup.
"You can't escape my keen smeller, woof!" "Hey, I'm the detective here!"

121021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any enemy followers are in play and no other allied followers are in play, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
121021010.baseFlair_: The "Sage of the Sea" is no more. It is not wisdom that will protect his brethren, but force. The sagacious merman casts aside reason and girds himself for battle alongside his comrades.
121021010.evoFlair_: The hands that once turned pages turn now to rending flesh. The mouth that once imparted knowledge now imparts fanged death. The sage's long-awaited successor did not come; the only option left is to carry out his duty and become the "Scourge of the Sea."

125021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
125021020.baseFlair_: Many people want to believe that the divine speaks to them directly. Heh, I used to believe that too. But it is a mechanism of the Lord that creates the Word—I'm merely the cog which delivers it to the people through my arrows.
125021020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers with 1 defense.
125021020.evoFlair_: People's faith is sustained by the Word. Even should my strength fail, I will deliver my arrows near and far, to good and evil alike. Forgive me, my Lord! I will—no, I must—spread the Word!

126021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower +1/+1 and the ability to ignore Ward.
126021020.baseFlair_: "Come with me, or don't. And if you do, at least make yourself useful." Calloused by years of exploration, the pathfinder has grown self-reliant. "Being used? Being betrayed? I've learned to accept that it comes with the territory."
126021020.evoFlair_: "I was prepared to deal with your treachery. You reap what you sow!" Those who maintain their trustworthiness in his presence have nothing to fear. "This job requires a hardened heart. The soft are doomed to backstabbing."

128021010.baseFlair_: I don't really know how I ended up as a girl, but I do know one thing... In this world of conflict, we all need a little love! I've got all eyes on me, and I'm gonna keep it that way. I'll be the most popular girl in school!
128021010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve a random unevolved allied Skeleton.
128021010.evoFlair_: In this world of conflict, the only thing you can truly rely on is your friends. The spell wore off before I got to be queen bee of the school, but that's not gonna stop me. First goal: a hundred friends!

100031010.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
At the start of your turn, combine with an allied Harnessed Glass to become a Flame and Glass.
100031010.baseFlair_: I have no regrets. If I didn't burn Mother to death, Glass would have been killed!
100031010.evoFlair_: Mother hated Glass and wanted to kill her, but I couldn't let that happen! I wanted to know Glass! She's a part of me after all. I had to protect her.

100031020.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
At the start of your turn, combine with an allied Harnessed Flame to become a Flame and Glass.
100031020.baseFlair_: I knew what I'd become. But I had to freeze Father, or he would have hurt Flame. I had no choice.
100031020.evoFlair_: Father loved Flame—he only hated that she killed Mother. That's why I had to watch over Flame. I couldn't let her kill Father too.

104031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Deal 1 damage to all enemies 4 times.
104031020.baseFlair_: I am Grimnir, heaven's chosen god of war and the mad cyclone. I have descended from the lofty realm to save this world, but make no mistake... I'm not here to make friends.
104031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104031020.evoFlair_: As my power grows, something within me whirls ever more madly. And few who see me unleash the cyclone will forget the sight of a mighty war god consumed by fury.

105031010.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
When another allied follower attacks, this follower can attack until the start of your next turn.
105031010.baseFlair_: I spend my life here in this tower, braiding and unbraiding my hair. But if someone were only to come to me...
105031010.evoFlair_: Here in this tower I'm lonely. No one comes to me but the songbirds. But if someone were only to take my hand, then I'd say good-bye to this tower.

107031020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Goblin, Goblin Leader, or Goblin Princess.
Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point or less comes into play, give it Rush.
107031020.baseFlair_: There is no need for scheming or tactics, for violence is of the essence! Scream for vengeance, cry your fury—we will lay waste to the heavens!
107031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107031020.evoFlair_: From the birds in the skies to the insects of the earth—we shall hunt, we shall feed! Our order shall rise and lay claim to every last corner of this world!

109031020.baseFlair_: Bahahaha! Laugh, celebrate, rejoice! For it is I, the supreme gourmet emperor, in the flesh! I have made my glorious return! Now then, shall I serve up a feast for the world?
109031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Nourishing Fare or Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand.
109031020.evoFlair_: There are two dishes on tonight's menu! Will you be embraced by sublime nourishment, be immersed in flaming-hot passion? Bahahaha! Don't be picky, just choose!

112031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
112031020.baseFlair_:
"I brought you some tea, bro!"
"Oh, thanks! Did you spill it all on the way over or something? Oh well, it's the thought that counts!"
—Hnikar and Grimnir
112031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112031020.evoFlair_:
"Let's get moving, Grimnir."
"Okay, okay! Haven't you ever heard of personal space?"
—Jafnhar and Grimnir

113031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an enemy follower is in play, change this follower's attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to the attack and defense of a random enemy follower.
113031020.baseFlair_:
"That's right. I'm a mirror into your soul."
"Oho! Such meaty thighs! Such tender flesh! Now this must be some world-class quality meat!"
"Qua... You tryin' to roast me?!"
—Hamsa and Khaiza
113031020.evoFlair_:
"Wow! Such gorgeous feathers! They'd make a fabulous accessory."
"Q-quaack! Don't even think about pluckin' these feathers!"
—Hamsa and Nelcha

115031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a follower with Fanfare (excluding Princess Knight) from your deck into your hand.
115031020.baseFlair_: He awoke with no memories, no powers of his own. But the bonds forged by his pure heart light his companions' path forward.
115031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Recover 1 play point. Subtract 2 from the Union Burst of all followers in your hand.
115031020.evoFlair_: He knows not why he is here—only what he has learned since awakening. But he bravely swings his sword for friendship, cutting through artifice to seek out a true ending.

118031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Goblins into your hand.
118031020.baseFlair_: I'm not too fond of my husband's violent handling of the power struggle. It only leads to more bloodshed when we should be focused on choosing a successor.
118031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Transform an allied Goblin into a Goblin King.
118031020.evoFlair_: Being overwhelmingly strong may work for now, but if you fancy yourself a true king, then you'll help me choose the ideal match for our daughter!

119031030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give an enemy follower the following effect - When this follower leaves play, banish it instead. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Enhance (7): Summon a Combustion Demon, then evolve all unevolved allied Combustion Demons.
119031030.baseFlair_: Sheesh, it's freezin' out here! I think I actually preferred the flames of purgatory... I gotta start a fire or something. Lucky for me there's all this kindling walking around!
119031030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
119031030.evoFlair_: Nrrrgh, I can't stop my teeth from chattering! It'll take a lot more than a little bonfire before this place starts feeling like home. Pile on more wood, we're gonna light it up tonight!

715031010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give an enemy follower the following effect - When this follower leaves play, banish it instead. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Enhance (7): Summon a Combustion Demon, then evolve all unevolved allied Combustion Demons.
715031010.baseFlair_: Brr, it's freezing! How do people live in this cold?! I'd rather be back in purgatory. Buuuut, there is a lot of kindling just walking around, so I'm sure I can get this place warmed up!
715031010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
715031010.evoFlair_: Nrrrgh, it's so cold, my goosebumps are getting goosebumps! Good thing I've got these flames, and there's a ton of stuff to burn here. Pile on more wood, it's gonna be an inferno tonight!

125031020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give the enemy leader the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Reduce defense restored to your leader to 1.
Clash: Gain +2/+0.
125031020.baseFlair_: Do I have a weakness, you ask? Hah! I am the mighty, invincible, super cute Feena! Nothing can possibly—Goblin Mage! That isn't a shiny thing, it's the guardian of the crypt! Stop, you'll wake it up...!
125031020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Clash: Gain +2/+0.
125031020.evoFlair_:
Feena got me out of trouble again today. She was mad at me, but in the end, she smiled and patted me on the head, 'cause we're forever friends! I love you, Feena!
—Goblin Mage's Diary

900031020.baseFlair_: These wings have been blackened by the shadow of temptation. Corrupted by desire, I have fallen. But heavens, heed my call—for what purpose was I born this way, created this way?
900031020.evoFlair_: Where can one find sin? In those corrupted by temptation, or in a god who has created beings unable to triumph over its beckoning?

107041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Enhance (6): Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers.
Enhance (9): Put a Morrigna's Gospel into your hand.
107041020.baseFlair_: The goddess mirrors battle; or rather, battle is a reflection of her will. In the fabric of hope and despair, fated glory and fierce adversity are woven together. —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 5
107041020.evoFlair_: War is merciful; war is ruthless. Fools are heralded as heroes, and heroes are forgotten in death. The path of your destiny rests upon the raven's feather—will you meet glory or death? —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 8

116041010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Use X play points to give +X/+X to this follower and another allied follower. X equals your remaining play points.
116041010.baseFlair_: Look up to the heavens and perk your ears. Judgment's trumpet will sound without timbre or tone. And, though wingless you might be, prophecy will be as your guidepost to the light.
116041010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116041010.evoFlair_: Bow your head and be enraptured. Divine words will shake the land without pretense or pulse. And, though powerless you might be, prophecy will be your offering to the darkness.

125041030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another random allied follower. Draw a card. Restore 1 defense to your leader. If at least 3 of your evolution points have been used this match, put a Morrigna's Gospel into your hand and change its cost to 1.
125041030.baseFlair_:
The hero mirrors tragedy; or rather, tragedy is a reflection of the hero. In the fabric of death and its aftermath, the goddess embraces the fallen, for love is the thread that keeps the tapestry whole.
—Trinity of Goddesses: New Gospel, Chapter 1
125041030.evoFlair_:
Give love unto the hero, in the form of a heroic death. When the Trine Goddess reveals all her aspects, the cries of the reborn hero shall sound across the heavens. And thus will a new legend walk the earth.
—Trinity of Goddesses: New Gospel, Chapter 10

128041010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If your leader's class is Forestcraft or Runecraft, recover 1 play point. If it's Shadowcraft or Portalcraft, summon 2 Ghosts. If it's Swordcraft or Dragoncraft, destroy an enemy follower. If it's Bloodcraft or Havencraft, restore 3 defense to your leader.
128041010.baseFlair_:
"I shall act as guide to those in need! Certainly, there are others struggling to find their way, just as I once did."
And so, he who wandered many walks of life saw that his true calling was not that of a knight, but of a teacher.
128041010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: If the enemy leader's class is Forestcraft or Runecraft, recover 2 play points. If it's Shadowcraft or Portalcraft, summon 2 Ancient Artifacts. If it's Swordcraft or Dragoncraft, destroy an enemy amulet. If it's Bloodcraft or Havencraft, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
128041010.evoFlair_:
...And that is why I felt it important for students to visit other countries and expand their horizons. Now, that's enough out of me. Let's hear all the things you experienced on the program!
—Exchange Program Afterparty, Opening Ceremony

900041040.baseEffect_:
Clash: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Last Words: Put a Moon and Sun into your hand.
900041040.baseFlair_: I am the one who brightens the sky. My work is to deliver light to all the world. I'll even light the abyss of the underworld with an endless shimmer.

104021020.baseFlair_: With our dear king behind us, we have nothing to fear! Soldiers, attack! The time to rise is now!
104021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104021020.evoFlair_: If we're defeated, our dear king will make the enemy pay! So march like heroes! Make the surface-dwellers go pop!

105021020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has at least 5 attack, reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
105021020.baseFlair_: No sense being a man if you don't go big. Giants? Dragons? Bring 'em on! No guts, no glory!
105021020.evoFlair_: I got big to be a real man. I've got no fear, and I'm happy to charge ahead. Watch out, 'cause these fists are gonna hurt!

107021010.baseEffect_:

Clash: Deal 4 damage to the enemy follower if it's a Neutral follower.
107021010.baseFlair_: Thou, who art chosen by the heavens—I shall assist thee in forging a new path. If thou seek'st chaos, make malice. If thou seek'st balance, make benevolence.
107021010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107021010.evoFlair_: I shall grant thee my strength. Ne'ertheless, thy fate is for thee to choose—to grasp with thine own hands. Forge thy destiny, and leave thy mark in history!

114021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another allied follower. If there are any Natura cards in your hand, give +2/+2 instead.
114021020.baseFlair_: They say hunger is the best spice, so everybody dig in! Don't mind me! The feast I'm looking forward to comes afterward!
114021020.evoFlair_: A full heart is just as good as a full belly, and seeing your smiling faces fills me up to the brim! Thank you so much—this is the best meal I've ever had!

115021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers Ward.
Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Ward.
115021010.baseFlair_: Ladies and gentlemen, it's the moment you've all been waiting for! A clash between the eight realms! Whose hopes and dreams will spur them on to victory? I'm here to give you the blow-by-blow for every nail-biting second of the action!
115021010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115021010.evoFlair_: Looks like the challenger blew in—I mean, the challenger in blue—just got a second wind! How offensive! Uh, no, I mean... What a strong offensive! Our boy in red is all roped up! No, wait—he's on the ropes! Urgh... Sorry about that, folks. I'm not monkeying around here, I swear!

118021020.baseEffect_:

118021020.baseFlair_: Bzzt! Zing! Cracka-boom! You getting a kick outta my supercharged rock yet? Huh? You think I'm a talentless grandstander? No way, buddy—I'm the real deal!
118021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118021020.evoFlair_: Doodley, doodley, dee... Gotta get in more practice if I'm gonna play a tune right... But just you wait—I'll knock your socks off with real music instead of electrical shock one day!

123021010.baseFlair_: Angels do what they want by divine right. Whether they succor or scourge mankind is up to them. Unfortunately, the latter fate awaits you. Any last words? No, no—I didn't mean you should speak. I've just always wanted to say that.
123021010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower.
Can't be attacked.
123021010.evoFlair_: I come down to earth only at heaven's decree, and the powers that be want you up there immediately. Hm? You wanted to live? Sorry, that's hardly my problem. Now, stop complaining and come with me.

127021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Pureshot Angel into your hand and subtract 3 from its cost.
127021010.baseFlair_: Not even the slightest moment to rest my wings... No matter, I will go. If we are idle in our work, the ignorant masses will take to the streets and proclaim the death of their gods. A thankless job, but it must be done—even if the heavens are woefully understaffed.
127021010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put an Angelic Smite into your hand and subtract 3 from its cost.
127021010.evoFlair_: It seems your luck has run out... The penalty for your decadence and trespasses is death. I will teach you to fear the heavens! Mercy? The gods show no mercy. Drown in the light of judgment!

101031020.baseEffect_:

At the start of your turn, all allied followers gain +1/+0.

101031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101031020.evoFlair_: Let us whip up winds to bind heaven and earth together as one. With my tempests I will lay waste to evil; with gentle zephyrs I will breathe life back into the children of the world!

103031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers that cost 2 play points or more. Deal 2 damage to all followers that cost 1 play point or less.
103031030.baseFlair_: Never have the cursed demons crawled out of their burrows in such numbers. If they aren't dispensed with quickly, innocent villagers will pay the price.
103031030.evoFlair_: You demon spawn who dared to assault my homeland... I will not rest until you've tasted the same suffering. My blades will dance until every last one of you succumbs to despair.

105031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card. Give +1/+1 to an allied follower.
105031020.baseFlair_: I'm Alice's cat, but I'm a babe too! So feel safe leaving me in charge—I'll do a babe-a-licious job!
105031020.evoFlair_: Huh, why am I blushing? I'm not! I'm not embarrassed. I can be a babe, but I'm a classy lady too!

105031030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy if you have at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand.
105031030.baseFlair_: In the age of the gods, a war scorched the skies and left the earth aflame. One intrepid warrior stood amidst the chaos to lead the military forces and defend his ancestral lands.
105031030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105031030.evoFlair_: In the age of the gods, an intrepid warrior charged ahead. He won fame throughout the land by striking off the heads of countless foes. Ready to fulfill his destiny, he glares down the shaft of an arrow nocked to his iron bow.

106031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Do this 2 times.
106031020.baseFlair_: Good? Evil? Like I care. After all, nothing's worse than an ordinary melody! The sound I play is neither good nor evil. It's somewhere in between light and dark—the twilight's melody!
106031020.evoFlair_: Songs about heroes, songs about despair—they're so plain and lifeless! The rhythm I'm after is nothing like that! My twilight melody will go beyond the fate of gods!

106031030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower. X equals this follower's attack.
106031030.baseFlair_: We were following its round hoofprints, trailing its melodious call. And then there it was—the golden beast. I let loose a thousand emotions in a single arrow, but the beast reflected the shot... right into my chest. —Qilin Hunter's Diary, last paragraph
106031030.evoFlair_: We've learned a lot from that hunter's death. It is not a creature to be hunted but a being to be exalted. Wickedness begets wickedness; goodness begets goodness. This is the true nature of the golden beast. —The Cult of Qilin, Chapter 1

110031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +3/+0 to a follower. Give that follower Strike: Deal 3 damage to this follower.
110031020.baseFlair_: Lovely little beastie, this pup. She'll be the one to decide your fate.
110031020.evoFlair_: Flee in desperation. The pain will hunt you—twist you—until you meet your immaculate end.

117031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put into your hand copies of the 3 left-most cards in your hand, in the order they were added.
117031010.baseFlair_: The Star shines on all, an emblem of hope. The path of countless twinkling lights she lays out guides travelers in search of their dearest dreams. The lost need only look up to the night sky, and they will find their hopes restored.
117031010.evoFlair_: She is the ruler of the twilight sky, looking down upon the works of mortalkind. Though she governs the stars, what lies beneath them is beyond her ken. She merely observes, smiling on the mortals' light-blessed faces.

117031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Add 1 to the cost of all non-follower cards in your opponent's hand until the start of your next turn.
117031020.baseFlair_: There is not a soul on this earth without sin. I too am without exception. Come, O Lord! Sound the harps and let judgment rain down upon all creation.
117031020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Increase your leader's maximum defense by 5. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
117031020.evoFlair_: Perhaps a soul untouched by sin exists somewhere, a precious life that deserves to be spared. But that is neither you nor I. Let us go swiftly—our doom awaits.

121031010.baseEffect_:

Ward.

121031010.baseFlair_: Thousands of stars adorn the velvet dark. Ah, what a truly beloved sight. Within each of these pinpricks of light dwell countless souls. I could watch the infinitesimal lives of these adorable creatures play out until the end of time.
121031010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121031010.evoFlair_: Unforgivable. Utterly inexcusable. Only rapture can still the ebb and flow of these countless lives. Any other end would sully the great work of the cosmos. I shall dedicate my life to ensuring that does not pass.

715031020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 5 play points, invoke this card.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - The next time your leader takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
715031020.baseFlair_: What precious gems adorn the velvet cosmos—each encapsulating the glimmer of countless lights... countless lives. Ah, I could gaze upon these baubles forever!
715031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
715031020.evoFlair_: On my life, none shall disturb my precious planets! Their light will be pure and unwavering until the last fleeting lives upon them flicker out.

122031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader. Do this 1 time. If any spells or amulets are in your hand, do this 2 times instead.

122031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all damaged enemy followers.

Grandpa has generations of knowledge about pyrotechnics, but all he ever teaches me is to trust my gut.
—Mavela, Budding Pyrotech

124031010.baseFlair_: I ain't the discriminatory type, ya know? Elves, beastmen, dwarves, dragons—got nothin' but deep respect for 'em. Why? I mean, look at the craftsmanship on these beauts!
124031010.evoFlair_: Diversity's important these days, ya know? You need vampires to take care of priests, necromancers to deal with wizards—there's a lot you gotta keep track of. All righty, which one of these bad boys should I use this time?

106041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - The next time you play a follower with Fanfare effects (excluding Choose and targeted effects), repeat them once. (This effect is not stackable.)
106041010.baseFlair_: He is the trickster, mayhem incarnate. A shrewd, bizarre, and yet indispensable impostor. He vows to the quiet twilight, laughing at his confinement. —Twilight's Child, preface
106041010.evoFlair_: An eternity spent idle; demise, a mere game. Kill a god? A poem on his lips. Revenge? A performance. With deliverance and disfigurement, now the twilight begins. —Twilight's Child, final chapter
