(This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
110041010.baseFlair_: This plane is not a singularity; it is an aggregate. Beasts of land, sea, and air; angels, demons, and children of men; even ancients—everything is part of the same whole. Therefore stand by your own will—and I shall see the world put to trial.
110041010.evoFlair_: Do not assemble or congregate. Do not gather or herd. You are a fraction of the ubiquitous whole; you were born to exercise your free will—and I shall see the world put to trial thusly.

117041010.evoFlair_: The end is imperfection, the portent of creation. All was crafted by The World's hand—and by that same hand all shall be undone.

Ward.

900041010.evoFlair_: Those imprisoned in the river of grief must be purged of their guilt, and the purge must continue for all eternity. This is no place for pardons or for the merciful release of death.

The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the first to have fallen, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Seven stars shine on eight souls crossing over the nine realms. Lo, ten wolves herald the true hero’s ascension.

You wouldn't understand what it's like! I work so much harder than you, but for what? Nothing. Absolutely nothing!
—Shiro Kiriyama

Be you friend or foe, the show must go on!

A hollow general of the impending silence.
It haunts the living, leading them en masse to the quiet calm of the end.

I'd give anything for her.

Anything.

101024030.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.

Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
111034010.baseFlair_:
You are your own god.
Solitude is proof of power.

"Why exactly have you been going back and forth so much?" —Ephemera, Angelic Slacker

102011020.baseFlair_: The twin-headed giant runs rampant under the moonlit sky. Blades shatter against its steel-like hide, and arrows bounce harmlessly into the dirt.
102011020.evoFlair_: Clad in armor of steel, the twin-headed giant stalks the night. Its blood-stained armor gleams with a dark promise beneath the moon.

106011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the attack of a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play to 1.
106011020.baseFlair_: How's my comely countenance? So exquisite you can't peel your eyes away, right? But don't be so surprised. Just wait—soon I'll be waxed to the max! Om-nom-nom...
106011020.evoFlair_: My face is the full moon! What do you think? So perfect you're getting weak in the knees, right? H-huh? All the green cheese has made me put on weight, you say? W-well... You're exactly right!

110011010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
----------
Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
110011010.baseFlair_: Hound of Culann, heaven's chosen warrior, unto you shall I bequeath my all-piercing spear, my runic magic—all I know of battle.
110011010.evoFlair_: The gods have high hopes for you, Hound. Therefore be guided by me in the arts of war. Hone your blade for the fated battle to come!

127011020.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, change the cost of this card to 1.
----------
Rush.
127011020.baseFlair_: Mysteries are shy little things, you know. But that's what makes them so irresistible—like a coy partner playing hard to get. This one's buried deep in an underground ruin, you say? A bit dangerous, but hey—nothing ventured, nothing gained!
127011020.evoFlair_: I finally found you, Little Miss Bashful! Oh, I'm so happy I could just kiss you! And to think, this is a sight nobody else in the entire world has seen... A privilege for my eyes only! Moments like these are why I'll never give up exploring.

105021030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +1/+1.
105021030.baseFlair_: Enter our territory if you will. But we'll provide no quarter for plunderers. Away, fangless one!
105021030.evoFlair_: Beastfolk we are, but monsters we're not. We don't swipe our claws haphazardly. So I'm chopping you in two with this mighty axe.

109021010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
109021010.baseFlair_: The day I freed Lyria... That's when I vowed to protect her with everything I have.
109021010.evoFlair_: It was a mistake to ally myself with the empire... You can throw whatever you like at me, but I won't let you lay a finger on Lyria!

112021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 6 defense to your leader.
Enhance (10): Restore 10 defense instead.
112021010.baseFlair_: I'm absolutely terrible at cooking, but I understand wanting to prepare a delicious meal for someone you care about. I would be more than happy to use my heavenly palate to assist you with your own cooking! Now then, let's have a taste... Oooh momma!
112021010.evoFlair_: This... This dish! What a delicate and gentle flavor! It's not perfect, but I can sense the love that went into its preparation—simply delightful. Hehe... It makes me want to head to the kitchen right now!

101031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand and gain +1/+1 for each card discarded.
101031030.baseFlair_: Yes, let me bathe in your screams of agony and despair. I am coming for you all, angels, and I will pluck every snow-white feather from your wings.
101031030.evoFlair_: Are you not honored, angels, to become prey for such a noble being as I? Go on now. Cry your last tears as you sink into hell.

101031040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all other allied followers the following effect until the end of the turn - Reduce damage to 0.
101031040.baseFlair_: Come, brave warrior. My shield shall protect you from harm and shall ward off the specter of defeat. I shall give you the ability to overcome endless conflict!
101031040.evoFlair_: My wisdom promises blessings greater than those of divine providence or earthly destiny! Come, you have been chosen! Fight alongside me against the forces of evil! The light of victory is set to shine upon you!

108031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy amulet. Gain +3/+3 instead if there are no enemy amulets in play.
108031010.baseFlair_:
Seeking mead, seeking rivals,
he crisscrosses the earth.
His sanity slips, his heart fills
with rage, floods with hate.
—Poems of Suttungr
108031010.evoFlair_:
The grinning war god quaffing mead.
Untouchable by men, tortured by memory,
he crosses mountains, treks ranges,
yet the heavenly one remains remote.
—Poems of Suttungr

113031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a follower. If it is an allied follower, randomly summon a copy of an allied follower that has been destroyed during this match. If it is an enemy follower, randomly summon an enemy copy of an enemy follower that has been destroyed during this match.
113031010.baseFlair_: Before those who continue to seek possibility, she reveals herself. Those who refuse to submit to the pain—she shall never abandon them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 2
113031010.evoFlair_: Before those who hinder possibility, she reveals herself. Those who would usurp freedom—she shall never forgive them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 3

115031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 3 cards. Discard 2 random cards from your hand.
115031010.baseFlair_: Sorry to keep you waiting! Now Mithra's here, so have no fear! The time for blessings and protections is near!
115031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return an enemy follower or amulet to your opponent's hand.
115031010.evoFlair_: You know, I'd love to just grant everybody's wishes... but rules are rules! First, I've gotta test you! Don't you worry, though! Mithra has something for all the good little boys and girls who try their best!

125031010.baseEffect_:

125031010.baseFlair_: Oinkie, oink! I'm back, and full of even more happy! I'll eat your sadness away, so dry your eyes and put a smile on your face!
125031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve a random unevolved allied Happy Pig.
125031010.evoFlair_: Oink, oinkie! Happiness is a warm and yummy meal! And when you get full, it's like you're floating on a fluffy cloud! If you're not full of happy yet, I have a supersized serving with your name on it!

Rush.
Bane.

If at least 3 Naterran Great Trees have been destroyed this match, give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are no allied Viridia Magnas in play, summon a Viridia Magna, evolve it, then remove this effect. (This effect is not stackable.)
114041010.baseFlair_: The aether withers, and nature dies with it—signs that our Mother has abandoned us. We must cast her aside, as all children must eventually cast aside their ancestral hearth. Naterra will be saved by the blade, and by the blade alone. —Valdain, Forest Shadow
114041010.evoFlair_: The aether glitters, and nature is its reflection—signs that our Mother has blessed us. We must treat her with grace, as all children must venerate their progenitors. Naterra will be saved by peace, and by peace alone. —Bayleon, Forest King

114041020.baseEffect_:
Ward.

104031010.evoFlair_: As the chosen harpist of the gods, I'll bring the melodies of paradise to those who suffer. Though the notes are still but a whisper, I believe they'll reach every corner of this world in time.

123031020.evoFlair_: The thunder cracks, the sky is sundered, the time for repentance ends. The divine aspect of thunder is merciless in his judgment. Those who in their pride ignored his warning shall be humbled by the onslaught of bolts, until naught is left but scorched earth.

101041010.evoFlair_: The archangel Gabriel's soul is as pure and white as her wings. As a divine representative, she presents the chosen one with new power in the form of a legendary sword.

103041020.evoFlair_: “Attack,” whispers the pure angel. A troop of valkyries fills the sky at her command and descends to drive away the wicked.

106041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a follower that originally costs 7 play points or less from your hand into play and destroy it. Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the attack of that follower.

106041020.evoFlair_: Stars don't always guide their observers to brilliant futures. No, death, despair, fear—these are their true predictions. You beings who pray to the heavens, offer your fear to the light.

108041010.evoFlair_: That which differs from all else in the world. That which transcends all else in the world. Great gods and dread demons bow their heads before it.

110041020.baseFlair_: Greetings, you adorable little soul. The world just laughs so innocently—makes me want to gobble it all up. When boys finally learn the bitterness inherent in yearning, that's when they ripen into men. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?

Hell loomed above the heavens, for the heavens lay at the ends of the earth.
We trod the clouds, we floated through the sky.
That has changed everything.

112041020.evoFlair_: Huginn reads the thoughts of the world, while Muninn perceives the memories of the world. Within the twilight, these two great birds deliver news of an unavoidable fate. Still the divine warlord chooses to descend upon the battlefield to face his enemies.

Ward.

Storm.

900041030.evoFlair_: The world is full of contradictions. Destruction and rebirth. Desire and despair. Love and hate. I am a mixture of all these things, given form in the present. Now, would you like to be burned? Or frozen? Or both?

102041020.evoFlair_: As the twilight begins to fall for the gods, their one-eyed father fought in the battle at Vigrid, clad in jet black armor and armed with a peerless spear.

124041010.evoFlair_: We are not the first amalgamation to disrupt the world. Gods and demons. Heaven and hell. Justice and evil—all creations of divine providence. Submit to the flame, and embrace crystallization.

127041010.baseFlair_: Oh, how sin corrupts the world—how sinners besmirch its beauty... How can fools claim this is but one side of man's ambition? It must not be permitted... I shall ascend to godhood and transform this world into a paradise, bereft of sin. Let the purification begin.
127041010.evoFlair_: Execution. Renunciation. Sepulture. Redolence. Purification. Penance. Forbearance. Virulence. Join me, Enforcers—angels of my creation, servants of my utopia... Watch on from up high, O false gods, as I purify this world and forge paradise. Let the rebirth begin.

900041090.baseFlair_:
The sixth circle: Heresy.
Those that have traversed the righteous order of the world will be burnt to ash.
900041090.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900041090.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the beguiler, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

900011070.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Strike: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900011070.baseFlair_:
"Brofams! Time to let 'er rip!"
"This formation is undefeated back home!"
"Dudes, let's get on it! Three, two, one..."
"Yaaahooo!"

102041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Increase your evolution points to 3.
102041010.baseFlair_: I welcome you, my new brethren in a world of chaos! Our clan's victories on the battlefield will surely be a blow to the gods.
102041010.evoFlair_: Today, my new brethren, we embark on a journey that will start with bloodshed but will one day lead us to a new world!

104041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
104041020.baseFlair_: The task of deciding whether to pass judgment was entrusted to the most sorrowful angel of them all. To ease the suffering of those who walk the earth, she played her melodies and sang of her sorrow.
104041020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104041020.evoFlair_: She could never eliminate all the suffering no matter how hard she tried, and she finally passed her judgment in despair. Her tears fell even as she cleaved through the sinful.

109041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all followers and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
----------
At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
109041010.baseFlair_: Summoned by an earnest plea, the dragon breaks its shackles. Its cry resonates across the sky and strikes awe into the hearts of all who hear it.
109041010.evoFlair_: Answering the call of the blue-haired girl, this dark dragon takes flight to confront a grave threat to all life. Unshackled at long last, its magnificent roar rattles the heavens.

111041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Randomly put 4 different Cocytus Cards into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Replace your deck with a deck of Cocytus Cards.
111041010.baseFlair_: The Heavens fall to Earth. Earth plunges into Hell. Cocytus swallows all, robbing Creation of breath and entombing it in ice. Conqueror. Serpent. Father of Lies. Being with faces innumerable—none of them true. The only certainty is this: He is the world's adversary.
111041010.evoFlair_: Part your lips to speak: Ice will take your throat, twine through your entrails. Be silent: Ice will seal your lips eternally. Blades shall rust away. Knowledge burn to cinders. Life shall be Cocytus's shivering prisoner. The only option is this: To cast this world aside.

115041020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers except a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Then, if at least 4 followers have been destroyed this turn, summon an Imperial Mammoth.
115041020.baseFlair_: Every hundred years, the towering mammoth god gathers the strongest fighters from every realm and holds a tournament. To enter, one must possess the eight essential wills. Competitors flock to the colosseum, each for their own reason.
115041020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115041020.evoFlair_: Every hundred years, the mammoth god's trumpeting opens wide the gates to other worlds. Victors shall rule. Losers shall serve. The clash of desires in the colosseum shall be offered up to the god.

125041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (5): Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. Put an Ultimate Bahamut into your deck. Recover 4 play points.
----------
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you've used at least 50 play points this match, invoke this card. Then, banish cards from your opponent's deck until there are 5 cards left.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy all enemy cards.
125041010.baseFlair_: The dawn of the end rides in on thunderous light. Every breath brings destruction, every wingbeat carries death, for all things must perish. Only in the ashes of the old world can a new world rise.
125041010.evoFlair_: The old world lies on the brink of ruin. But within destruction's void, warriors wreathed in the light of hope gather. Joining hands, they stand against the supreme dragon's wrath.

120031020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Choose - Put a Dawn's Splendor or Seraphic Blade into your hand.
----------
Ward.
At the end of your turn, restore 7 defense to your leader.
120031020.baseFlair_: She descends from on high, a shining, winged beacon of salvation. Souls, bound to the earth by their regrets, are drawn to her. The moment they gaze upon her, the soft nimbus of light she radiates washes away their earthly cares.
120031020.evoFlair_: She shines, enrobed in dazzling starlight, a winged beacon of courage. Souls, unshackled from their debased circumstance, fly at her side. Sustained by her children, the mother of rebirth roams the skies on a perpetual journey of salvation.

101041030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Replace your deck with an Apocalypse Deck.
101041030.baseFlair_: The would-be usurper of Heaven, cast into the pits of Hell, has risen again in a cloak of flame. Soon this underworld king shall spark an apocalypse that paints all mortals and gods in blood.
101041030.evoFlair_: The king of the underworld and his gathered armies of darkness reveled in the coming of the day of revelation. Chaos and destruction tore through the world in a dance of madness, staining all in despair.

103041010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers and amulets.
Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
103041010.baseFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. The beauty of its deep black frame overwhelms all else in creation.
103041010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103041010.evoFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. Unsurpassed are its divine powers, and heroes dream often of its glory.

104041010.baseFlair_: The omnipotent being who in time reigned supreme over the other gods. He was born to a goddess and rebelled against his divine father.
104041010.evoFlair_: Clad in the armor of fear and wielding a radiant lightning spear, the almighty sky father illuminated the sky of dawn.

105041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 20 from the cost of a Neutral card (excluding Queen of the Dread Sea) and a non-Neutral card in your hand. Then discard all other cards in your hand.
105041020.baseFlair_: Prostrate yourself, and vow your loyalty to me. You'll no longer thirst for what you wish for. Tell me your wishes, and then drink down mine.
105041020.evoFlair_: Where go your wishes? Your fragile dreams? Do they sink like a stone into the abyss, or do they rise like bubbles to the surface? Your actions determine all.

113041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
-Restore 5 defense to your leader.
-Gain +3/+0 and the ability to ignore Ward.
-Gain +2/+1 and Storm.
-Gain +1/+2 and Bane.
-Gain +0/+3 and Ward.
113041020.baseFlair_: A blade of lightning rests in his grip. The same flash that would make the night sky tremble—it punishes the darkness and descends upon the land. When the threads of fate entwine at last, the final battle against the lord of purgatory shall begin.
113041020.evoFlair_: The adamantine scythe destroys all that it touches; the aegis shield defends all from destruction. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

118041010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if X is greater than 0, subtract X from its cost and reveal it. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Can't be targeted by enemy effects or attacked.
118041010.baseFlair_: The gods pride themselves on their immortality, always brimming with hope and promise. But that arrogance will be their undoing. An apocalypse is coming, and I will be the one to lead it.
118041010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all enemies.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects or attacked.
118041010.evoFlair_: I subsist even as I fall beneath the mortal world. If the gods should remain as they are, then I shall one day climb out of this infernal abyss and purge the heavens of all pride. No matter how far up you go, there is no paradise among us.

119041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (5): Deal 4 damage to all followers. Give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Allied followers, spells, and effects deal +1 damage.
----------
Fanfare: Deal a pool of 12 damage divided between all other followers and the enemy leader. (First deal damage to allied followers equal to their defense in the order they came into play. Then do the same for enemy followers. Then, if any damage is left in the pool, deal it to the enemy leader.)
119041010.baseFlair_: The supreme dragon governs all creation. Its dark wings unfurl protectively over a world abandoned by its creators. The dragon's destructive force also heralds rebirth; thus does all life cycle, until it journeys to the sky and the stars beyond.
119041010.evoFlair_: The supreme dragon governs destruction and creation. Its divine will endures in perpetuity, unknown to man no matter how the ages pass. Yet the mysteries of creation are entrusted to them: tiny pinpricks of hope that dwell within their ephemeral forms.

900044020.baseEffect_: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 1.
900044020.baseFlair_: Your fate's reached the end of its thread.
